profile_intro:
Hi I am Anup!
 - Android Developer with 5+ years of experience building Android apps and SDKs
 - Maintains SDK that runs on thousands of apps producing millions of sessions every week
 - Prioritizes improvement of junior team members
 - Thrives in collaborative environments
 - Takes ownership and drives initiatives
 - Excellent Communicator
name: Anup Khanal
skills: Flutter, React-Native and Xamarin wrappers for Android SDKs

experience.description:
- Maintain SDK that runs on thousands of Apps creating millions of sessions every week
 - Maintain cross platform wrappers for the Native SDK
 - Maintain and improve performance and stability of the SDK
 - Plan and build new features and APIs
 - Understand and resolve edge case issues
 - Plan and improve code quality and architecture
 - Support CS team

- Plan and build Custom Yard Management Solution Android applications
 - Closely work with clients to acquire requirements and deliver products
 - Drive projects and initiatives 
 - Resolve issues and maintain stability
 - Continuously improve code quality and architecture

- Build ERP Android App that works alongside its web counterpart
 - Make and implement key architecture to support modular features
 - Closely work with product owners and stakeholders to acquire requirements and iterate on product features

- Completed multiple projects in areas of transportation and social media
 - Managed a team of android devs to create an effective unit
 - Focused on individual development of team members to produce long term results
 - Adapted to new technologies together with team to improve stability and developer output
 - Made key decisions for the products in every stage of their development

- Quickly acquainted myself with business logic of Branch-less Banking Android App
 - Gained competence in tech such as RxJava and Dagger to drive development
 - Successfully completed the project and oversaw its rollout
 - Built solid trust to support clients

- Collaborated with fellow interns to learn Android development
 - Successfully built a sound analysis app capable of recognizing and visualizing notes from sound
 - Learned and implemented Algorithms for the project

- Built websites using PHP and custom CMS
 - Quickly gained competence in PHP and built various websites for multiple clients
 - Built trust and understanding with clients to acquire and manage requirements

education.school: Advanced College of Engineering and Management
